name: The Ribbon Club ch2: Spring Storm
name_original: The Ribbon Club ch2: Spring Storm
description:
It's been raining a lot lately, so the Ribbon Club meetings are on hold. But that doesn't mean life is boring, as one day Button and Lily get a visit from a neighbor in need ...

The Ribbon Club 2: Spring Storm is the second chapter of Button Bit's daily life!

Arrow keys - move
Z - confirm, progress dialogue
Enter - confirm, bring up menu

The music is by
Maemi no Yume (@maemi_no_yume on twitter)
and Aaron Ishibashi (http://aishibashimusic.com) 

I hope you enjoy it!

PS. If the game won't run, please make sure you have XNA 4.0 installed. One of the downloads contains an installer.
